summary: THE THROTTLE STUCK, WHICH CAUSED UNWANTED SUDDEN ACCELERATION.  ON ONE OCCASION THE THROTTLE BODY WAS DIRTY AND ON ANOTHER OCCASION, WITH THE CRUISE CONTROL ON, THE VACUUM LINE MALFUNCTIONED.  IN EITHER CASE, PRESSING DOWN ON THE BRAKE PEDAL DID NOT STOP THE VEHICLE.  THE ONLY WAY TO STOP THE VEHICLE WAS TO TURN OFF THE IGNITION.    *TT  *JB
